file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: customerAccounts
  description: >-
    This is a generated connector for [WorkDay Customer Accounts REST API v1](https://community.workday.com/sites/default/files/file-hosting/restapi/index.html) OpenAPI specification.
    
    The customer accounts service enables applications to access  customer accounts information including customers, invoices,
    adjustments, and payments.
  version: v1
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials. 
    Follow [this guide] https://credentials.workday.com/docs/authentication/ and
    obtain tokens.
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: Workday Customer Accounts
    iconPath: icon.png
tags:
  - name: customers
    description: >-
      Use this REST API to retrieve basic customer profile information including
      credit details, payment terms and total balance.
  - name: invoicePDFs
    description: Use this REST API to retrieve printed customer invoice PDF documents.
  - name: invoices
    description: Use this REST API to retrieve customer invoices.
  - name: payments
    description: >-
      Use this REST API to record customer payments and retrieve basic customer
      payments information.
paths:
  /payments/{id}/remittanceDetails/{subresourceID}:
    get:
      tags:
        - payments
      summary: Retrieves a single customer invoice payment remittance line instance.
      operationId: getInvoicePaymentRemittanceLine
      description: >-
        Retrieves a customer invoice payment remittance line with the specified
        ID.

        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice Payment

        Scope: Customer Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: subresourceID
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the subresource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ViewRemittanceDetails
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /payments/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - payments
      summary: Retrieves a single customer invoice payment instance.
      operationId: getInvoicePaymentInstance
      description: |-
        Retrieves a customer invoice payment with the specified ID.

        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice Payment

        Scope: Customer Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ViewCustomerPayment
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /customers/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - customers
      summary: Retrieves a single customer instance.
      operationId: getSingleCustomerInstance
      description: |-
        Retrieves a customer with the specified ID.

        Secured by: View: Customer

        Scope: Customers
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CustomerView
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /invoices/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - invoices
      summary: Retrieves a single customer invoice or adjustment instance.
      operationId: getInvoiceOrAdjustmentInstance
      description: |-
        Retrieves a customer invoice or adjustment with the specified ID.

        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice - View, Process: Project Billing

        Scope: Customer Accounts, ~Project~ Billing
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CustomerInvoice
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /invoicePDFs/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - invoicePDFs
      summary: Retrieves a single customer invoice PDF instance.
      operationId: getInvoicePDFInstance
      description: |-
        Retrieves a customer invoice PDF with the specified ID.

        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice - View, Process: Project Billing

        Scope: Customer Accounts, ~Project~ Billing

        Contains attachment(s) only
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /payments:
    post:
      tags:
        - payments
      summary: Creates customer invoice payments.
      operationId: createInvoicePayment
      description: >-
        Creates a single customer invoice payment header instance with the
        specified data. 


        In the request body, specify at least these required fields: company
        {id}, type {id}, payment amount and currency, payment date, and payment
        type {id}. Specify the remitFromCustomer {id} if the ready to auto-apply
        option is set to true. 


        This endpoint is equivalent to the Record Customer Payment task in
        Workday.


        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice Payment


        Scope: Customer Accounts
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/CreateCustomerPayment
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateCustomerPayment
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            Error Code | Validation Message

            --- | ---

            A146 | Enter a payment currency.

            A144 | Enter a company.

            A150 | Payment types with a payment method of "Credit Card" or
            "Direct Debit" are not supported.

            A149 | Enter a payment date.

            A152 | Enter a total payment amount greater than 0.

            A147 | Enter a payment type.

            A145 | To set the ready to auto-apply option to yes, select a
            remit-from customer.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: createCustomerPayment
  /invoices:
    get:
      tags:
        - invoices
      summary: Retrieves a collection of customer invoices and adjustments.
      operationId: getCollectionOfInvoices
      description: >-
        Retrieves all customer invoices and adjustments. 


        You can filter the invoice and adjustments using the following query
        parameters: company, billToCustomer, invoiceStatus, paymentStatus,
        transactionType, fromDueDate, toDueDate, fromInvoiceDate, toInvoiceDate.


        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice - View, Process: Project Billing


        Scope: Customer Accounts, ~Project~ Billing
      parameters:
        - name: billToCustomer
          in: query
          description: The customer on the invoice.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: company
          in: query
          description: >-
            The company used for Common Financial Dimensions. This is for
            internal use only on a REST API.
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: fromDueDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The due date of the customer invoice or invoice adjustment as of the
            defined reporting date, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: fromInvoiceDate
          in: query
          description: The date of the customer invoice, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: invoiceStatus
          in: query
          description: |-
            The current status of an invoice document.

            Include invoices with these invoice statuses:
            Approved (91b0d382d50848e898733757caa9f84a), 
            Canceled (dc76c9b6446c11de98360015c5e6daf6), 
            Denied (dc76c7cc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6), 
            Draft (dc76c4fc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6), 
            Incomplete(e264bc68581342baa70ab61bf71032fe), 
            In Progress (dc76c8bc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6).
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: paymentStatus
          in: query
          description: |-
            The payment status of an invoice document. 

            Include invoices with these payments statuses:
            Paid (d9e4362a446c11de98360015c5e6daf6), 
            Unpaid (d9e43940446c11de98360015c5e6daf6), 
            Partially Paid (d9e43706446c11de98360015c5e6daf6).
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        - name: toDueDate
          in: query
          description: >-
            The due date of the customer invoice or invoice adjustment as of the
            defined reporting date, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: toInvoiceDate
          in: query
          description: The date of the customer invoice, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: transactionType
          in: query
          description: >-
            The transaction type of this customer transaction. Use the string
            "invoice" or "adjustment" to filter to retrieve either only invoices
            or adjustments.
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/CustomerInvoice
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /invoices/{id}/printRuns/{subresourceID}:
    get:
      tags:
        - invoices
      summary: Retrieves a single customer invoice print run.
      operationId: getInvoicePrintRun
      description: >-
        Retrieves a customer invoice print run with the specified subresource ID
        for the specified customer invoice or adjustment.


        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice - View, Process: Project Billing


        Scope: Customer Accounts, ~Project~ Billing
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: subresourceID
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the subresource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PrintRun'
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /invoices/{id}/printRuns:
    get:
      tags:
        - invoices
      summary: >-
        Retrieves a collection of customer invoice print runs for the specified
        customer invoice or adjustment.
      operationId: getInvoicePrintRunForSpecifiedInvoice
      description: >-
        Retrieves all customer invoice print runs for the specified customer
        invoice or adjustment.


        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice - View, Process: Project Billing


        Scope: Customer Accounts, ~Project~ Billing
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/PrintRun
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /customers:
    get:
      tags:
        - customers
      summary: Retrieves a collection of customers.
      operationId: getCustomerCollection
      description: |-
        Retrieves all customers.      

        You can filter the customers using the following query parameters: name.

        Secured by: View: Customer

        Scope: Customers
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: The name of the customer.
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/CustomerView
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /payments/{id}/remittanceDetails:
    post:
      tags:
        - payments
      summary: Creates customer invoice payment remittance lines.
      operationId: createCustomerInvoice
      description: >-
        Creates customer invoice payment lines with the specified data for the
        specified customer invoice payment ID. 


        To create a single instance, specify the single JSON object in the
        request body. To create multiple instances, specify "bulk=true" as a
        query parameter. You must specify the JSON object collection in data[ ]
        in the request body. The maximum collection size is 100.


        In the request body, specify at least one of these required fields:
        billToCustomer{id}, invoice {id}, or amountToPay.


        Secured by: Process: Customer Invoice Payment


        Scope: Customer Accounts
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/CreateRemittanceDetails
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateRemittanceDetails
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            Error Code | Validation Message

            --- | ---

            A154 | Remittance lines may only be added to payments with payment
            status in progress or draft, and with payment application status
            unapplied.

            A151 | Ensure the invoice you select for the remittance detail match
            the payment currency.

            A155 | Either bill-to customer or invoice must be specified for the
            remittance detail.

            A148 | Ensure the invoice company on the remittance detail matches
            the payment company.

            A157 | Remittance advice may not be added to cross-currency
            payments.

            A153 | Ensure the currency in the amount to pay of the remittance
            details matches the payment currency.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: createRemittanceDetails

                  type: string
